refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the smallest integer not less than x

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the smallest integer not less than x

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ceil(x) (init-, control-, or audio-rate arg allowed)
refsect1.para: where the argument within the parentheses may be an expression. Value converters perform arithmetic translation from units of one kind to units of another. The result can then be a term in a further expression.
